Chinese:
你爸爸做什么工作？
我爸爸是做买卖的。
你妈妈做什么工作？
我妈妈是家庭妇女。
你哥哥的职业是什么？
我哥哥是当兵的。
你大姐做什么工作？
我大姐是空中小姐。
你二姐做什么工作？
我二姐是护士。
你弟弟做什么工作？
我弟弟是新闻记者。
Pinyin: Nǐ bàba zuò shénme gōngzuò? Wǒ bàba shì zuò mǎimài de. nǐ mā mā zuò shén me gōng zuò? wǒ māmā shì jiātíng fùnǚ. nǐ gē gē de zhí yè shì shén me? wǒ gēgē shì dāng bīng de. Nǐ dàjiě zuò shénme gōngzuò? wǒ dàjiě shì kōngzhōng xiǎojiě. Nǐ èrjiě zuò shénme gōngzuò? wǒ èr jiě shì hù shi. nǐ dìdi zuò shénme gōngzuò? wǒ dìdì shì xīnwén jìzhě.
English: What does your father do? My dad is a businessman. What does your mother do for work? My mother is a housewife. What is your brother's occupation? My older brother is in the army. What does your eldest sister do for work? My eldest sister is a flight attendant. What job does your second older sister do? My second sister is a nurse. What job does your younger brother do? My younger brother is a journalist.

Chinese:
小李，你家现在有几个人？
我家有我爸爸，我妈妈，我弟弟，我老公和我女儿。
你爸爸是干什么的？
我爸爸是教书的。
那你妈妈呢？
我妈妈也是教书的。
那你弟弟做什么工作？
他是大学生。
那你老公是搞什么的？
我老公是搞电脑的。
那你家呢？
我的父母都退休了。我爸爸以前是工程师。我妈妈是大夫。我也有一个弟弟，他是开出租车的。
Pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ, nǐ jiā xiànzài yǒu jǐ gè rén? Wǒ jiā yǒu wǒ bàba, wǒ māmā, wǒ dìdi, wǒ lǎogōng hé wǒ nǚ'ér. Nǐ bàba shì gàn shénme de? wǒ bàba shì jiāoshū de. nà nǐ māmā ne? wǒ māma yěshì jiāoshū de. Nà nǐ dìdi zuò shénme gōngzuò? tā shì dà xué shēng. Nà nǐ lǎogōng shì gǎo shénme de? wǒ lǎogōng shì gǎo diànnǎo de. nà nǐ jiā ne?
English: Li, how many people are there in your family now? There are my father, my mother, my younger brother, my husband, and my daughter in my family. What does your father do? My dad is a teacher. And your mother? My mother is also a teacher. What does your younger brother do? He is a college student. What does your husband do? My husband is a computer technician. What about your home?

Chinese:
这是谁家的照片？
这是我全家人的照片。
这两个人是你的父母吗？
对。
你爸爸今年多大岁数？
他今年五十八岁。
你爸爸做什么工作？
他是一家电脑公司的经理。
你妈妈呢？
我妈妈在一家饭店工作，她是厨师。
这个当兵的是谁？
他是我三舅。
这个女的是谁？
她是我舅妈。
她做什么工作？
她是家庭妇女。
这个年轻的是谁？
他是我二叔。他是大学生。
Pinyin: zhè shì shéi jiā de zhào piàn? zhè shì wǒ quán jiā rén de zhào piàn. zhè liǎng gè rén shì nǐ de fù mǔ ma? duì. nǐ bà ba jīn nián duō dà suì shù？ Tā jīnnián wǔshíbā suì. Nǐ bàba zuò shénme gōngzuò? Tā shì yī jiā diànnǎo gōngsī de jīnglǐ。 nǐ māmā ne? wǒ māmā zài yī jiā fàndiàn gōngzuò, tā shì chúshī. zhè gè dāng bīng de shì shuí? tā shì wǒ sān jiù. zhè ge nǚ de shì shéi? Tā shì wǒ jiùmā. Tā zuò shénme gōngzuò? tā shì jiātíng fùnǚ。 Zhège niánqīng de shì shuí?
English: Whose photo is this? This is a photo of my whole family. Are these two people your parents? Yes. How old is your father this year? He is fifty-eight years old this year. What does your father do? He is the manager of a computer company. Where is your mother? My mother works at a restaurant, she is a chef. Who is this soldier? He is my third uncle. Who is this woman? She is my aunt (mother's brother's wife). What job does she do? She is a housewife. Who is this young person?

Sentences.Pinyin: zhè shì shéi jiā de zhào piàn?
Sentences.English: Whose photo is this?

Chinese:
王红，听说你刚刚结婚。恭喜你！
你家有几口人？
八口人。我父母，我弟弟，我妹妹，我爷爷，我奶奶，还有我丈夫。
你家有多少人？
我家也有八口人。我父母，三个弟弟，一个妹妹，还有我妻子。
你父母做什么工作？
他们现在都退休了。你父母呢？
他们做点小生意。
你老公在哪儿上班？
他在中学当老师。
那你太太做什么？
我老婆也是中学老师。
你弟弟多大？
我大弟弟25岁，他是公务员。我二弟弟24岁，他是银行职员。我小弟弟17岁，他上高中。你弟弟呢？
他也17岁，他是高中生。
你妹妹多大？
我妹妹16岁，她上高中。你妹妹呢？
我妹妹13岁，她是初中生。
Pinyin: Wáng Hóng, tīngshuō nǐ gānggāng jiéhūn. Gōngxǐ nǐ! Nǐ jiā yǒu jǐ kǒu rén?  Nǐ jiā yǒu duōshǎo rén?  Nǐ fùmǔ zuò shénme gōngzuò?  tā men zuò diǎn xiǎo shēng yì。 Nǐ lǎogōng zài nǎr shàngbān? tā zài zhōng xué dāng lǎo shī。 nà nǐ tài tài zuò shénme? Wǒ lǎopó yěshì zhōngxué lǎoshī. nǐ dìdi duō dà?  Tā yě 17 suì, tā shì gāozhōngshēng. nǐ mèimi duō dà? Wo meimei 16 sui, ta shang gaozhong. Ni meimei ne? Wǒ mèimei shísān suì, tā shì chūzhōngshēng.
English: Wang Hong, I heard you just got married. Congratulations! How many people are there in your family?  How many people are there in your family?  What do your parents do for a living?  They do a little business. Where does your husband work? He works as a teacher at a middle school. What does your wife do? My wife is also a middle school teacher. How old is your younger brother?  He is also 17 years old, he is a high school student. How old is your younger sister? My younger sister is 16 years old, she is in high school. What about your younger sister? My younger sister is 13 years old, she is a junior high school student.

Sentences.Chinese: 王红，听说你刚刚结婚。恭喜你！

Chinese:
王老师，你家有几口人？
我家有六口人。
学生:你丈夫做什么工作？
他是电脑工程师。
王老师，你有几个孩子？
我有四个孩子，两个儿子，两个女儿。
他们都做什么工作？
我大儿子在医院工作，我二儿子是汽车司机；我大女儿是会计，我二女儿是做生意的。
你有孙子和孙女吗？
我有一个孙子，一个孙女。我孙子是大学三年级的学生。我孙女是护士。
Pinyin: Wáng lǎoshī, nǐ jiā yǒu jǐ kǒu rén? Wǒ jiā yǒu liù kǒu rén. xuéshēng: nǐ zhàngfū zuò shénme gōngzuò? tā shì diàn nǎo gōng chéng shī。 Wáng lǎoshī, nǐ yǒu jǐ gè háizi? wǒ yǒu sì gè hái zi, liǎng gè ér zi, liǎng gè nǚ ér. tāmen dōu zuò shénme gōngzuò? wǒ dà érzi zài yīyuàn gōngzuò，wǒ èr érzi shì qìchē sījī；wǒ dà nǚér shì kuàijì，wǒ èr nǚér shì zuò shēngyì de。 nǐ yǒu sūnzi hé sūnnǚ ma?
English: Teacher Wang, how many people are there in your family? There are six people in my family. Student: What does your husband do for work? He is a computer engineer. Teacher Wang, how many children do you have? I have four children, two sons and two daughters. What kind of work do they all do? My eldest son works at the hospital, my second son is a car driver; my eldest daughter is an accountant, my second daughter does business. Do you have a grandson and a granddaughter?
